ticket.title: Store Migration Issue > 1 and 2 all migrated as 1
ticket.original-body:
ASICS has "Specialty Stores" which means stores that carry a lot of products. It depends on the sport category: sometimes a store will only be a specialty store in Running, but not Hockey.
In the old database, this is recorded as 1 or 2. 1 = specialty store, 2 = normal (not specialty/other).
It seems all data has been migrated as 1. This needs to be fixed and reimported.

version.body:
Hi Anatole,
can you upload the excel file to me? there is some wrong in the import script, should i need to reimport the excel after fix it?

version.title: Store Migration Issue > 1 and 2 all migrated as 1

version.body:
Hi Bin
We need to reimport the original data from current ASICS website and make sure that all 1s and 2s remain 1s and 2s. Let me know if you have a question.
